attributes.action: to put pressure on the FA to remove Steve Mclaren as England first team coach.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For the first time since the World Cup 1994, We face a Major Football Finals without England taking part. This is unforgivable with the talent available to him, and Steve Mclaren should be removed without delay. This is before he can cause any more damage to the morale of the English people.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
